creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: two men at lower center have just caught a large fish: older man at L holds long bamboo fishing pole that extends along L side of scroll and out of frame; younger man at PL extends chubby arms above his head to catch the fish still hanging from the fishing line at UR; scroll has tromp l'oeil border and mount with wave motif along bottom
markings: LLC, two-part oval intaglio and relief seal
medium: Ink and light colors on silk
title: Ebisu
